entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
